item.description: Divination is the practice of discerning the hidden significance of events and foretelling the future. Divination is found in all societies, ancient and modern, through methods such as horoscopes, palm reading, and tarot cards. Other methods involve interpreting dreams, discovering omens in natural events, reading the behavior of animals, casting runes, and consulting oracles. Divination has long been viewed as the province of specially gifted persons, such as prophets, shamans, and magicians, however it is easily within the reach of all.
item.name: Class & Open Circle - Divination
